casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Richard PRIDGEN 344P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 03, 2017 Paul F. Herzog, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, for Pridgen, Richard. Elizabeth A. Fisher, Assistant Solicitor General, John F. Maddrey, Solicitor General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of October 2016 by State of NC to Withdraw and Substitute Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
